page.title: 12Childrens Culbs in Bexley
page.content: The Cub Scout conservation badge is all about helping animals in danger of extinction. Last week we went to Danson Park lake to remove all the fishermans tackle, as a lot of ducks would have their legs caught and injured in their struggle. Last week Scouts used axes & saws to cut logs in half. Then we had to pull them off the bank and drag them about 100m to the compound. One slip and the bank would come tumbling down. This was in aid of the camp fire and seating. Gymnastics clubs and swimming clubs. Many people who go to these clubs go every week and work hard both there and at home doing their exercises. It is an enjoyable thing to do if you work hard and do what your coach says but it makes you very tired. by A Bowman J Ulph M Fung H Lizius.
